channel.title: Game Saving timer
channel.description:
Hey just wondering how to change the timer on the saving of each persons file. Just want to prevent a bit of lag. If you have any other methods of getting rid of lag please post.
Thanks!

item.title: Game Saving timer
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

[quote=“adamp40, post:2, topic:201000”]SAVEHANDLER!

How dumb do you get![/quote]

How dumb do you get??

SaveGamHandler doesnt have a set timer.

TO REALLY CHANGE HOW FAST IT SAYS OR NOT

you look for this in server.java:

public static final int cycleTime = 500;

Change the 500 to whatever you wish

I suggest you dont change too much because it may cause lag and it is by milliseconds.

Read full topic
